sentences.sContent: There are fears that the march will heighten racial tension.
sentences.sCn: 有人担心这次游行会加深种族间的紧张局势。

sentences.sContent: Increased levels of fat in the diet could heighten the risk of cancer.
sentences.sCn: 饮食中脂肪摄入量的提升会增加患癌症的风险。

synos.tran: 提高；增高；加强；使更显著

remMethod.val: height(高度， 海拔) + en(使…) → 提高 → (使)增强， (使)加剧

words.tran: 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的
高度地；非常；非常赞许地
高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带

trans.tranOther: if something heightens a feeling, effect etc, or if a feeling etc heightens, it becomes stronger or increases
